thread.title: Aemetis reports 2Q loss

title: Aemetis reports 2Q loss
text:
Tip : Use comma (,) to separate multiple quotes. Learn more... 
Thu, Aug 6, 2015, 10:55 BST - UK Markets close in 5 hrs 35 mins Aemetis reports 2Q loss Aemetis posts 2nd-quarter loss of $6.3 million Associated Press – 15 minutes ago 3.33 +0.02 
CUPERTINO, Calif. (AP) _ Aemetis Inc. (AMTX) on Thursday reported a second-quarter loss of $6.3 million, after reporting a profit in the same period a year earlier. 
The Cupertino, California-based company said it had a loss of 32 cents per share. 
The renewable fuels and specialty chemicals company posted revenue of $38.1 million in the period. 
The company's shares closed at $3.33. A year ago, they were trading at $10.40. 

This story was generated by Automated Insights (http://automatedinsights.com/ap) using data from Zacks Investment Research. Access a Zacks stock report on AMTX at http://www.zacks.com/ap/AMTX
